it.polimi.se2019.server.model

Class GraphWeaponEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.Effect
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.GenericWeaponEffect
        • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.GraphWeaponEffect

  • public class GraphWeaponEffect
extends GenericWeaponEffect
    This class extends Generic Weapon Effect GenericWeaponEffect by adding a partial effect to it. As a matter of fact, each weapon or power up effect is made up of smaller effects that have a target specification TargetSpecification that defines their effect.
